member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1
member.summary: Base class for API-specific builders.
member.typeparam: The type of client created by this builder.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.CredentialsPath
member.summary: The path to the credentials file to use, or null if credentials are being provided in a different way. The resulting credential is automatically scoped with the default scopes for the API.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.JsonCredentials
member.summary: The credentials to use as a JSON string, or null if credentials are being provided in a different way. The resulting credential is automatically scoped with the default scopes for the API.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.ApplicationName
member.summary: A custom application name to use for this client, or null to use the default application name.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.BaseUri
member.summary: A custom base URI for the service, or null to use the default URI.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.Credential
member.summary: The credential to use for authentication. This cannot be specified alongside other authentication properties. Note that scopes are not automatically applied to this credential; if a scoped credential is required, the scoping must be applied by the calling code.

member.name: P:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.ApiKey
member.summary: An API key to use instead of a regular credential. If this is non-null and no other credentials are supplied, it will be used as the only credentials. If other credentials are supplied (such as through ) then the two values will both be used together.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance with no settings.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.Validate
member.summary: Validates that the builder is in a consistent state for building. For example, it's invalid to call on an instance which has both JSON credentials and a credentials path specified.
member.exception: The builder is in an invalid state.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.ValidateAtMostOneNotNull(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Validates that at most one of the given values is not null.
member.param: The message if the condition is violated.
The values to check for nullity.
member.exception: More than one value is null.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.CreateServiceInitializer
member.summary: Creates an initializer for the service. This method does not perform any validation.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.CreateServiceInitializerAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates an initializer for the service asynchronously. This method does not perform any validation.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.GetHttpClientInitializer
member.summary: Obtains credentials synchronously. Override this method in a concrete builder type if more credential mechanisms are supported.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.GetHttpClientInitializerAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Obtains credentials asynchronously. Override this method in a concrete builder type if more credential mechanisms are supported.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.GetScopedCredentialProvider
member.summary: Returns the scoped credential provider for this builder.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.GetDefaultApplicationName
member.summary: Returns the default application name, used if no custom name is otherwise specified.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.Build
member.summary: Builds the resulting client.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ClientBuilderBase`1.BuildAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Builds the resulting client asynchronously.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.PageManagerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods on IPageManager, just to avoid repetitive code.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager`3
member.summary: Interface describing the relationship between requests, responses and resources for page streaming.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager`3.SetPageSize(`0,System.Int32)
member.summary: Applies the given page size to the given request.
member.param: The page size for the next remote call.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager`3.SetPageToken(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Applies the given page token to the given request.
member.param: The page token for the next remote call.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager`3.GetResources(`1)
member.summary: Extracts resources from a response.
member.returns: The resources in the response, or null if it contains no resources.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager`3.GetNextPageToken(`1)
member.summary: Extracts the next page token from a response.
member.param: The response to extract the next page token from.
member.returns: The next page token, or null if this is the final page of results.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.RestPagedAsyncEnumerable`3
member.summary: An asynchronous sequence of resources, obtained lazily via API operations which retrieve a page at a time.
member.typeparam: The API response type. Each response contains a page of resources.
The resource type contained within the response.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.RestPagedAsyncEnumerable`3.#ctor(System.Func{`0},Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager{`0,`1,`2})
member.summary: Creates a new lazily-evaluated sequence from the given API call, initial request, and call settings.
member.param: A factory used to create an initial request each time the sequence is iterated over.
A manager to work with the requests and responses.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ResponseAsyncEnumerable`3
member.summary: An asynchronous sequence of API responses, each containing a page of resources.
member.typeparam: The resource type contained within the response.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.RestPagedEnumerable`3
member.summary: A sequence of resources, obtained lazily via API operations which retrieve a page at a time.
member.typeparam: The API response type. Each response contains a page of resources.
The resource type contained within the response.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.RestPagedEnumerable`3.#ctor(System.Func{`0},Google.Api.Gax.Rest.IPageManager{`0,`1,`2})
member.summary: Creates a new lazily-evaluated sequence from the given API call, initial request, and call settings.
member.param: A factory used to create an initial request each time the sequence is iterated over.
A manager to work with the requests and responses.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ScopedCredentialProvider
member.summary: Simple factory of scoped credentials, which caches a scoped version of the default application credentials to avoid repeated authentication.

member.name: F:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ScopedCredentialProvider._lazyScopedDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Lazily-created task to retrieve the default application credentials. Once completed, this task can be used whenever credentials are required. The returned task always runs in the thread pool, so its result can be used synchronously from synchronous methods without risk of deadlock. The field is initialized in the constructor, as it uses _scopes, and you can't refer to an instance field within an instance field initializer.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ScopedCredentialProvider.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a channel pool which will apply the specified scopes to the credentials if they require any.
member.param: The scopes to apply. Must not be null, and must not contain null references. May be empty.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ScopedCredentialProvider.GetCredentials(Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.GoogleCredential)
member.summary: Returns credentials with the scopes applied if required.
member.param: Existing credentials, if any. This may be null, in which case the default application credentials will be used.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result of the task is the scoped credentials.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.ScopedCredentialProvider.GetCredentialsAsync(Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.GoogleCredential)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns credentials with the scopes applied if required.
member.param: Existing credentials, if any. This may be null, in which case the default application credentials will be used.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result of the task is the scoped credentials.

member.name: T:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.UserAgentHelper
member.summary: Common code used for building user agents and related headers in REST libraries.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.UserAgentHelper.GetDefaultUserAgent(System.Type)
member.summary: Formats a user agent suitable for REST client libraries.
member.param: The type to extract the version number from.

member.name: M:Google.Api.Gax.Rest.UserAgentHelper.CreateRequestModifier(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a request modifier which sets the Google-specific version header in HTTP requests.
member.param: The type to extract the version number from.
